snippet: After 17 months, a nominee was announced to lead the Office of Financial Research, an agency that has been slow to fill its ranks and meet its deadlines.
abstract: After 17 months, a nominee was announced to lead the Office of Financial Research, an agency that has been slow to fill its ranks and meet its deadlines.

headline.main: For Wall Street Overseer, Progress Comes at a Crawl
headline.print_headline: For Wall Street Overseer, Progress Comes at a Slow Crawl
